title: Mutants: On Genetic Variety and the Human Body
description: A study of congenital disease and some of the famous individuals whose lives were affected by congenital abnormalities describes a village of long-lived Croatian dwarves, a hair-covered Burmese royal court family, the ostrich-footed Wadoma of the Zambezi River valley, and others. 15,000 first printing.
author: Armand Marie Leroi
